verses.verse: For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and will yet <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H3240>set<s%> them in their own <S%H127>land<s%>: and the <S%H1616>sojourner<s%> shall <S%H3867>join<s%> himself with <S%H5596>them<s%>, and they shall cleave to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.

And the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H935>them<s%>, and bring them to their <S%H4725>place<s%>; and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H5157>possess<s%> them in the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> for <S%H5650>servants<s%> and for <S%H8198>handmaids<s%>: and they shall take them <S%H7617>captive<s%> whose <S%H7617>captives<s%> they <S%H7287>were<s%>; and they shall rule over their <S%H5065>oppressors<s%>.

And it shall come to pass in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall give thee <S%H5117>rest<s%> from thy <S%H6090>sorrow<s%>, and from thy <S%H6090>trouble<s%>, and from the <S%H7186>hard<s%> <S%H5656>service<s%> wherein thou wast made to <S%H5647>serve<s%>,

that thou shalt take <S%H5375>up<s%> this <S%H4912>parable<s%> against the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, How hath the <S%H5065>oppressor<s%> <S%H7673>ceased<s%>! the golden <S%H4062>city<s%> <S%H7673>ceased<s%>!
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H4294>staff<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, the <S%H7626>sceptre<s%> of the <S%H4910>rulers<s%>;

that <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> in <S%H5678>wrath<s%> with a <S%H1115>continual<s%> <S%H4347>stroke<s%>, that <S%H7287>ruled<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> in <S%H639>anger<s%>, with a <S%H4783>persecution<s%> that <S%H1097>none<s%> <S%H2820>restrained<s%>.
The whole <S%H776>earth<s%> is at <S%H5117>rest<s%>, and is <S%H8252>quiet<s%>: they break <S%H6476>forth<s%> into <S%H7440>singing<s%>.

Yea <S%H1265><s%>, the fir-trees <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> at <S%H730>thee<s%>, and the cedars of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, <S%H7901>saying<s%>, Since thou art laid low, no <S%H3772>hewer<s%> is come up against <S%H5927>us<s%>.

Sheol <S%H7585><s%> from beneath is <S%H7264>moved<s%> for thee to <S%H7125>meet<s%> thee at thy <S%H935>coming<s%>; it stirreth <S%H5782>up<s%> the <S%H7496>dead<s%> for <S%H6260>thee<s%>, even all the chief ones of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; it hath raised <S%H6965>up<s%> from their <S%H3678>thrones<s%> all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.
All they shall <S%H6030>answer<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H2470>thee<s%>, Art thou also become weak as <S%H4911>we<s%>? art thou become like unto us?

Thy <S%H1347>pomp<s%> is brought <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>, and the <S%H1998>noise<s%> of thy <S%H5035>viols<s%>: the <S%H7415>worm<s%> is <S%H3331>spread<s%> under <S%H8438>thee<s%>, and worms cover <S%H4374>thee<s%>.

How art thou <S%H5307>fallen<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, O <S%H1966>day-star<s%>, <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H7837>morning<s%>! how art thou cut <S%H1438>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>, that didst lay <S%H2522>low<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%>!

And thou <S%H559>saidst<s%> in thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>, I will <S%H5927>ascend<s%> into <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, I will <S%H7311>exalt<s%> my <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%>; and I will <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, in the uttermost <S%H3411>parts<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%>;
I will <S%H5927>ascend<s%> above the <S%H1116>heights<s%> of the <S%H5645>clouds<s%>; I will make myself <S%H1819>like<s%> the Most <S%H5945>High<s%>.
Yet thou shalt be brought <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>, to the uttermost <S%H3411>parts<s%> of the <S%H953>pit<s%>.

They that <S%H7200>see<s%> thee shall <S%H7688>gaze<s%> at <S%H995>thee<s%>, they shall consider <S%H376>thee<s%>, saying, Is this the man that made the <S%H776>earth<s%> to <S%H7264>tremble<s%>, that did <S%H7493>shake<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%>;

that <S%H7760>made<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> as a <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and <S%H2040>overthrew<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H6605>thereof<s%>; that let not loose his <S%H615>prisoners<s%> to their <S%H1004>home<s%>?
All the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, all of <S%H7901>them<s%>, sleep in <S%H3519>glory<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> in his own <S%H1004>house<s%>.

But thou art cast <S%H7993>forth<s%> away from thy <S%H6913>sepulchre<s%> like an <S%H8581>abominable<s%> <S%H5342>branch<s%>, <S%H3830>clothed<s%> with the <S%H2026>slain<s%>, that are thrust <S%H2944>through<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, that go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H68>stones<s%> of the <S%H953>pit<s%>; as a dead <S%H6297>body<s%> trodden under <S%H947>foot<s%>.

Thou shalt not be <S%H3161>joined<s%> with them in <S%H6900>burial<s%>, because thou hast <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> thy <S%H776>land<s%>, thou hast <S%H2026>slain<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%>; the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H7489>evil-doers<s%> shall not be <S%H7121>named<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

Prepare <S%H3559><s%> ye <S%H4293>slaughter<s%> for his <S%H1121>children<s%> for the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, that they <S%H6965>rise<s%> <S%H1077>not<s%> <S%H3423>up<s%>, and possess the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> with <S%H6145>cities<s%>.

And I will rise <S%H6965>up<s%> against <S%H5002>them<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, and cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> and <S%H7605>remnant<s%>, and <S%H5209>son<s%> and <S%H5220>son<s%>'s son, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

I will also <S%H7760>make<s%> it a <S%H4180>possession<s%> for the <S%H7090>porcupine<s%>, and <S%H98>pools<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>: and I will <S%H2894>sweep<s%> it with the <S%H4292>besom<s%> of <S%H8045>destruction<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> hath <S%H7650>sworn<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H1819>Surely<s%>, as I have thought, so shall it come to <S%H3289>pass<s%>; and as I have purposed, so shall it <S%H6965>stand<s%>:

that I will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> in my <S%H776>land<s%>, and upon my <S%H2022>mountains<s%> tread him under <S%H947>foot<s%>: then shall his <S%H5923>yoke<s%> <S%H5493>depart<s%> from off <S%H5448>them<s%>, and his burden <S%H5493>depart<s%> from off their <S%H7926>shoulder<s%>.

This is the <S%H6098>purpose<s%> that is <S%H3289>purposed<s%> upon the whole <S%H776>earth<s%>; and this is the <S%H3027>hand<s%> that is stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> upon all the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> hath <S%H3289>purposed<s%>, and who shall <S%H6565>annul<s%> <S%H3027>it<s%>? and his hand is stretched <S%H5186>out<s%>, and who shall turn it <S%H7725>back<s%>?
In the <S%H8141>year<s%> that <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H4194>died<s%> was this <S%H4853>burden<s%>.

Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> <S%H6429>not<s%>, O Philistia, all of <S%H7626>thee<s%>, because the rod that <S%H5221>smote<s%> thee is <S%H7665>broken<s%>; for out of the <S%H5175>serpent<s%>'s <S%H8328>root<s%> shall come <S%H3318>forth<s%> an <S%H6848>adder<s%>, and his <S%H6529>fruit<s%> shall be a <S%H8314>fiery<s%> <S%H5774>flying<s%> <S%H8314>serpent<s%>.

And the <S%H1060>first-born<s%> of the <S%H1800>poor<s%> shall <S%H7462>feed<s%>, and the <S%H34>needy<s%> shall lie <S%H7257>down<s%> in <S%H983>safety<s%>; and I will <S%H4191>kill<s%> thy <S%H8328>root<s%> with <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and thy <S%H7611>remnant<s%> shall be <S%H2026>slain<s%>.

Howl <S%H3213><s%>, O <S%H8179>gate<s%>; <S%H2199>cry<s%>, O <S%H5892>city<s%>; thou art <S%H4127>melted<s%> <S%H6429>away<s%>, O Philistia, all of <S%H935>thee<s%>; for there cometh a <S%H6227>smoke<s%> out of the <S%H6828>north<s%>, and there is no <S%H909>straggler<s%> in his <S%H4151>ranks<s%>.

What then shall one <S%H6030>answer<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of the <S%H1471>nation<s%>? That <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H3245>founded<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, and in her shall the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> of his <S%H5971>people<s%> take <S%H2620>refuge<s%>.
